definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_log_in</field><next><block type="create_date"><field name="dateName">special</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1" elseif="2"/><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="get_day"><field name="dateName">special</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">31</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="get_month"><field name="dateName">special</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">global:IsHalloween</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_achievement"><field name="achievement">CUSTOM:HappyHalloween</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></next></block></statement></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="get_day"><field name="dateName">special</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">BOR</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">24</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">25</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="get_month"><field name="dateName">special</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">12</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">global:IsChistmas</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement><value name="IF2"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="get_month"><field name="dateName">special</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO2"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="get_day"><field name="dateName">special</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">17</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">global:IsAnniversary</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">global:IsAnniversary</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">global:IsHalloween</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">global:IsChistmas</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
